sourceText: Teach your child about keeping safe distances
text: Aprann pitit ou kijan pou l kenbe distans sekirite ak lòt moun

sourceText: Create a flexible but consistent daily routine.
text: Mete sou pye yon seri aktivite chak jou men se pou w dispoze epi adapte w tou pafwa.

sourceText: Make a schedule for you and your children that has time for structured activities as well as free time. This can help children feel more secure and better behaved.
text: Fè yon pwogram pou ou ak pitit ou ki byen òganize aktivite yo ak tan lib tou. Sa ka ede timoun yo santi yo pi an sekirite epi sa ka ede yo konpòte yo pi byen.

sourceText: Children or teenagers can help plan the routine for the day – like making a school timetable. Children will follow this better if they help to make it.
text: Timoun oswa adolesan yo ka ede planifye aktivite w fè chak jou yo – tankou yon pwogram sou fason y ap jere tan yo pou aktivite lekòl yo. Lap pi fasil pou yo suiv pwogram nan si yo te patisipe nan fè pwogram nan.

sourceText: Include exercise in each day - this helps with stress and kids with lots of energy at home.
text: Mete spò nan aktivite n ap fè chak jou - sa ka ede kont strès ak timoun ki gen anpil enèji lè yo ret lakay yo.

sourceText: You are a model for your child’s behavior.
text: Ou se yon egzanp pou sa ki gen rapò ak konpòtman pitit ou.

sourceText: If you practice keeping safe distances and hygiene yourself, and treat others with compassion, especially those who are sick or vulnerable – your children and teenagers will learn from you.
text: Si w respekte epi pratike distans sekirite epi w gen bon abitid ijyèn, epi w trete lòt moun ak konpasyon, sitou moun ki malad e ki pi frajil yo – timoun yo ak pitit ou ki adolesan ap imite w.

sourceText: At the end of each day, take a minute to think about the day. Tell your child about one positive or fun thing they did.
text: Nan fen chak jounen, pran yon ti tan pou w reflechi sou jounen an. Pale ak pitit ou sou yon bagay ki pozitif ak bagay ki gen plezi yo te fè.

sourceText: Praise yourself for what you did well today.
text: Felisite tèt ou pou bon bagay ou te fè jodi a.

sourceText: You are a star!
text: Ou se yon Jeni!

sourceText: If it is OK in your country, get children outside.
text: Si yo pèmèt sa nan peyi w, soti ak timoun yo.

sourceText: You can also write letters and draw pictures to share with people.
text: Ou ka fè lèt oswa desen pou w pataje ak lòt moun.

sourceText: Put them up outside your home for others to see!
text: Mete yo pa deyò kay ou pou lòt moun ka wè yo!

sourceText: You can reassure your child by talking about how you are keeping safe.
text: Sa ka soulaje pitit yo lè w di yo sa w fè pou pwoteje tèt ou.

sourceText: Listen to their suggestions and take them seriously.
text: Koute sijesyon yo epi pran yo oserye.

sourceText: Make handwashing and hygiene fun
text: Fè kesyon lave men ak ijyèn tounen yon bagay amizan

sourceText: Make a 20-second song for washing hands. Add actions!
text: Chante yon chante pandan 20 segond lè wap lave men w. Ajoute aksyon!

sourceText: Give children points and praise for regular handwashing.
text: Bay timoun yo pwen epi felisite yo paske yo lave men yo souvan.

sourceText: Make a game to see how few times we can touch our faces with a reward for the least number of touches (you can count for each other).
text: Fè yon jwèt pou w wè konbyen fwa nou ka touche figi nou epi nap rekonpanse moun ki touche figi l mwens fwa a (youn ka konte pou lòt).

sourceText: Structure Up
text: Òganize

sourceText: Covid-19 Parenting
text: Edikasyon timoun nan peryòd Covid-19

sourceText: COVID-19 has interrupted our daily work, home and school routines.
text: COVID-19 la te kanpe travay nou, aktivite nou fè lakay chak jou ak aktivite lekòl nou.

sourceText: This is hard for children, teenagers and for you. Making new routines can help.
text: Sa difisil anpil pou timoun yo, adolesan yo ak pou ou tou. Fè nouvo aktivite chak jou ka ede w.

sourceText: Parenting tips from WHO
text: Konsèy ki soti nan WHO pou paran

sourceText: Parenting tips from UNICEF
text: Konsèy ki soti nan UNICEF pou paran

sourceText: In worldwide languages
text: Nan tout kalite lang yo pale nan mond lan

sourceText: evidence-base
text: baze sou bonjan prèv

sourceText: For more information click below links:
text: Pou jwenn plis enfòmasyon klike sou lyen ki pi ba yo:

sourceText: Partners
text: Patnè yo

sourceText: Funders
text: Moun ki finanse yo
